game.name: AI女友 AI girlfriend
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.shortDescription: The AIs from your phone suddenly appear right beside you—and it seems a conflict has broken out between them. In the game, DeepSeek—once a cooperative AI partner—suddenly turns rogue due to an unknown anomaly, becoming a force that disrupts the balance of the world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The AIs from your phone suddenly appear right beside you—and it seems a conflict has broken out between them. In the game, DeepSeek—once a cooperative AI partner—suddenly turns rogue due to an unknown anomaly, becoming a force that disrupts the balance of the world.
